title: Ramadan 2026: Will the month of fasting begin from Wed, Feb 18 or Thurs, Feb 19?
summary_full: Muslims worldwide are anticipating 2026 Ramadan's start with great pomp and show. Do astronomical calculations point to Wednesday, February 18 or Thursday, February 19, 2026, as the most likely first day in Saudi Arabia, the UAE and many other nations? Here's what the local moon sightings, the blend of tradition and science favours for the holy month of fasting and reflection.
